patthana15.64:1.1_0: Rūpāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.64:1.1_1: Narūpāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.64:2.1: Narūpāvacaraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ dve paccayavasena.)
